overview: Anna Kalman is an accomplished actress who has given up hope of finding the man of her dreams. She is in the middle of taking off her face cream, while talking about this subject with her sister, when in walks Philip Adams. She loses her concentration for a moment as she realizes that this is the charming, smart, and handsome man she has been waiting for.
tagline: How dare he make love to me - And not be a married man!
cast: Cary Grant|Ingrid Bergman|Cecil Parker|Phyllis Calvert|David Kossoff
